name: Lost in Nothing.
description:
This is Submitted for the LMOB Beginner Game Jam #14

Its a game about getting lost in the "Nothing". You explore the world collecting items that may (or may not) help you find your way to safety. 

Arrow Keys / WASD to move and SPACE BAR to show dialog box. 

Hope you enjoy. 

Made in a 3 man Team.

Programmer: Zoddhand (SDL2 C++)

Artist: CloneThirteen

Sound: Klim
